page.title: 11"Sports in Metheringham"
page.content: There are many clubs in Metheringham. {The Football club}have 100 members and they have two teams. The Bowls club is on Alfred Avenue and they have one large green. {The Squash club}has 200 members. It has two courts, a pool table and bar. The annual subsription is Â£30 for adults and Â£15 for juniors.The club is run by the Kipling family. {The Golf course}has eighteen holes it also has a pratise ground for pratice. It has a shop to buy golf clubs etc., plus a clubhouse ,bar,snooker table, dart board and two slot machines. {The Badminton club}is on Wednesday and Thursday from 8.00 to 10.00.And has 12 members in each group.It's mainly for fun as hardly any members play seriously.{The Swimming pool}is in the school ground.The Swimming club organise lessons,lifesaving and badges
